abstract.para: It is sometimes useful to place a group of resources on the same node (defining a colocation constraint), but without having hard dependencies between the resources. For example, you want two resources to be placed on the same node, but you do not want the cluster to restart the other one if one of them fails.

topic.para: This can be achieved on the &crmshell; by using the weak-bond command:
The weak-bond command creates a dummy resource and a colocation constraint with the given resources automatically.
